infos.value: You can deploy your party and have them procure materials without having to directly command them.
Don't forget that you can still enhance units and perform mock battles while your party is deployed, so try putting this feature to good use.

◆ Background Repeat ◆
This function allows you to repeat quests in the background.
Even if the app is not running, you can use this to gather items and JP.

◆ Clear Time Calculation ◆
When starting Background Repeat, the time it takes to clear the quest will be calculated beforehand.

◆ Calculation Method ◆
The time calculation will be based on an Auto Battle performed at double or triple-speed with no companion being used.

◆ Repeat Settings ◆
After the clear time is calculated, the Repeat Settings screen will display, and you will be able to set the number of NRG Restores you want to use, or recalculate the clear time if you like.
Once the Background Repeat has begun, it will be performed based on the calculated clear time and the amount of time that has passed.

◆ Claim Rewards ◆
You can stop Background Repeat and claim your rewards via the Background Repeat button on the home screen.
Proceed to a tutorial on Background Repeat?
